Public Member Functions

 FusionProjectile ()

Detailed Description

Holds all state information for each projectile.

An instance of this object holds the state data for each projectile in the game. This object should remain general enough to be used by client and server.

Remarks:
When a weapon fires, and instance of this class is produced.
